item.description:
We'll meet at Mitchell Library to discuss the details of planning a meetup in Paris and the Toulouse area of Southern France.

Marybeth Tambora of The Goose In Toulouse Travel will be on hand to discuss travel packages for our group trip. She will also provide French cheeses for us to sample.

Some of you may remember I sent out an e-mail last year to discover if there would be enough interest to pursue a trip to France. There was, so I'm in the process of putting it together.

Some highlights we're looking at including are the Louvre, The Toulouse Lautrec Museum, and the prehistoric caves of Niaux.

If you are interested in the trip, please join us to discuss all the details. If you're interested but can't make it to the discussion, please e-mail me and let me know. The trip will be contingent on having about 14 people or more to get group discounts to defray costs.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the meeting room on the right as you enter the library
item.name: France Trip Discussion with Marybeth Tambora of The Goose In Toulouse Travel
